response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This remarkable item holds immense value to us, but we believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs and aspirations. We are offering this exceptional product to you at a special price of $1,100,000. We understand its worth to you might be even higher, and we aim to bridge the gap while ensuring both parties benefit from this transaction. Please let us know if you would like to proceed with this offer or discuss further details. We look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 1100000}
